divs: sighting detailsi obsevered what appeared to be a reddish "star" from my backyard. given that it appeared different from the other stars i retrieved my binoculars and viewed the star. the object could be seen darting erratically leaving a significant trail. it was multi-colored but had a red theme from which the colors and vapor trail followed. i photographed it over a period of 3-4 weeks in august 2012 and have a number of pictures with various patterns of travel. i had to replace camera batteries after 6 - 10 pictures. there is\was a second white "star" very bright s\e of the reddish star. this apprears more "orb" like but also moves about and leaves a trail -no color just white. i don't know if the two are related or not. while i have a myriad of pictures every time i try to enclose i lose the mufon form so will submit via e-mail upon requet as i am very intrigued and curious as to what was observed. looking forward to your expediant response. thanks
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Clovis
There were no other sightings in Clovis on or around August 2nd 2012
Summary: star like object(s) move erractically multi-colored with vapor type trails
